about_the_game:
In Vandalhalla you play to bring back amusement in a near future where fun is forbidden.



You will bring back the fun in the city by participating in illegal fights. This fights highly recommends you to destroy the environment, kill your opponents and control capture points.



Vandalhalla give you a large panel of short, medium and long ranged weapons, grenades and diverse mechanics. Numerous classic and original abilities for always more interesting and chaotic battles.





When you enter a battle you need to compose first a loadout with some weapons and abilities of the arsenal, then you are free.



Free to steal doors from building and killing opponents with it.
Free to catch missiles and send it back to the sender.
Free to become the weapon and throw yourself in a kamikaze style.



Physical interaction is the key in Vandalhalla as you can see above, you can do whatever you with the help of your Gravity Gun.

short_description: Have fun in the online Fast FPS Vandalhalla ! Play in team to stomp on your opponents with more than fourty weapons and abilities, experience the Shifumi concept with a total freedom in your loadout, and interact with your surroundings !
